title: The Children's Treasury of Classic Poetry
description: This collection of poems includes works that should be part of every childhood. William Blake, Robert Browning, Lewis Carroll, Coleridge, Keats, Melville, Shelley, Shakespeare, and more weave magic with words. The poems are divided by categories like Dreams and Wonders, Tales of Travel, and At the End of the Day to make finding the perfect poem for any occasion easy.The illustrations are styled to each selection and are at times sweet and soulful or vibrant, charming, and silly.
author: Nicola Baxter
